section.title: Lock Non-Root Accounts with UID 0
section.para: Locks any account that has a user identification (UID) of zero that is also not the root user. Only the root user should have this unique UID. A user with the same UID will have the same privileges as root.
It is highly recommended that you apply this module.

note.title: Manual Action May Be Required
note.para: This module will only lock the questionable account. Subsequent scans will also fail until you manually remove the account in question.
